definitions.definition: the sport or activity of travelling in a boat with sails

examples.text: the college rowing and sailing teams
They are going on a 10-day sailing trip.

definitions.definition: one of the regular times that a ship leaves a port

examples.text: There are six sailings a day.
What time is the next sailing?
Sailings were suspended in the high winds.
The company operates regular sailings between Hull and Zeebrugge.
the 4 p.m. sailing from Dover to Calais

definitions.definition: to be simple and free from trouble
